title: Meta’s $1.3 Billion Fine Is a Strike Against Surveillance Capitalism
description: The record-breaking GDPR penalty for data transfers to the US could upend Meta's business and spur regulators to finalize a new data-sharing agreement.

title: Twitter CEO Linda Yaccarino Is Teetering on the Glass Cliff
description: Elon Musk’s appointment repeats a pattern in which companies led into crisis by men suddenly appoint women leaders.
